categories: Category:Enlisted stormtroopers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Briggs was a Human male stormtrooper who served the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. In 1 BBY, he served alongside Cadet Leader Kyle Katarn's platoon in the assault on AX-456. While he hesitated to leave the Imperial transport vessel Briggs was immediately reprimanded by Sergeant major Hong and later killed in the ensuing battle.
